name: CRIF SpA
membership: CRIF belongs to and engages with a number of organisations that are active at the national/European/global levels. Some key organisations: Association of Consumer Credit Information Suppliers (ACCIS); European Federation of Finance House Associations (Eurofinas); European Association of Credit Rating Agencies (EACRA); Federation of Business Information Service (FEBIS); Big Data Value Association (BDVA); European Covered Bond Council (ECBC); Finance, Credit & International Business Association (FCIB); International Real Estate Federation (FIABCI); European AVM Alliance
goal: Software development, design, provision and support in relation to services and products dealing with credit information and business information, addressed to banks, financial companies, insurances, telecommunications, utilities, businesses and consumers. Design and provision of training. Provision and monitoring of ratings.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union, Digital Single Market, Evalution of the Consumer Credit Directive
